entry.title: Tahoe Sunspot Basket Tooled Longhorn Inlay Bronc Halters

Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Bronc Halters
Price: 39.99

Beautifully crafted of USA leather with hand tooled basket weave design. Noseband accented with silver studded sun spots. Center of basket weave tooling adorned with longhorn cutout and cowhair inlay. Stylish yet durable.
  • Beautifully crafted USA Leather
  • Hand tooled basket weave design
  • Longhorn cutout with cowhair inlay
  • Noseband accented with sun spots
  • Adjustable noseband

entry.title: Weaver Leather Basic Adjustable Chin and Throat Snap Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 19.95

When you're looking for the perfect combination of dependability and value, Weaver Leather's Basic halters are the right choice. With features like brass plated hardware, box-stitching at stress points, oblong buckle holes and a sewn-in throat snap, this 1" nylon halter is a great buy.

entry.title: Derby Originals 7’ and 10’ Premium Softgrip Cotton Lead Ropes with Replaceable Snap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Lead Ropes
Price: 12.99 - 14.99 (10 variants)

Derby Originals Derby Originals 7’ and 10’ Premium Softgrip Cotton Lead Ropes with Replaceable Snap are designed to make any activity requiring a lead rope easier and hassle-free. These premium lead ropes are made of a soft and cushioned cotton material that is comfortable to hold while remaining extremely durable. This non-bulky material is also easier to handle and store than other braided or rounded lead ropes, which are often overly heavy and hard to handle. These lead ropes measure 1” wide and are available in either 7’ or 10’ lengths. Derby Originals 7’ and 10’ Premium Softgrip Cotton Lead Ropes are designed with removable snaps, so if anything happens to your snap over time, you can easily replace it without having to replace your entire lead rope! Our premium soft lead ropes come in the colors Black, Charcoal, Hot Pink, Red, and Hurricane Blue to best suit your taste. These fun and modern colors are sure to stand out compared to your average plain lead ropes.


  • PREMIUM DESIGN MAKES LEADING EASIER - our lead rope is made of plush cushioned cotton, which is not slippery and makes it easier to hold onto without losing your grip, as well as a removable nickel bolt snap to extend the life of your lead rope.
  • REMOVABLE SNAP - our lead ropes include a heavy-duty nickel-plated bolt snap that is designed to be less intrusive and bulky than traditional snaps. This snap is easily removable so you can replace it if needed.
  • CUSHIONED COTTON DESIGN - this lead rope is made of a soft cotton web that is easy and comfortable to hold, and will not chafe or irritate. This material is also extremely durable and not prone to fraying or breaking.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO LENGTHS - our premium cotton lead ropes are available in 7’ and 10’ lengths to best suit your needs. These multipurpose lead ropes are perfect for tying, trailering, leading, using as a leash, and more!
  • AVAILABLE IN FIVE COLORS - our premium soft lead ropes come in the colors Black, Charcoal, Hot Pink, Red, and Hurricane Blue to best suit your taste. These fun and modern colors are sure to stand out compared to your average plain lead ropes.

Adorn your horse and step out in style with this hand-tooled basket weave halter. Features double layered leather at bend points and solid brass hardware.

  • Solid brass nickel plated hardware

entry.title: Derby Originals Desert Rose Collection Rose Gold Reflective Safety Flex-Webb Horse Halters with Matching Lead Ropes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 32.99 - 39.99 (18 variants)

Derby Originals brand new Desert Rose Collection of halters and lead ropes are the newest line of premium quality horse halters and lead ropes on the market. These unique and modern tack pieces feature innovative and elegant Rose Gold and Blackout nickel-plated hardware that is unlike anything else offered before. Our hardware is not only breathtaking in its beauty and quality but was designed to hold up strong for long-term use. Derby Originals Desert Rose Collection was designed to emulate the colors, feel, and beauty of the American Southwest in every stunning detail. We meticulously designed these Desert Rose halters and leads right here in the U.S.A. and are proud to be able to stand behind our products and offer a one year warranty on these products. Derby Originals’ Desert Rose Collection halters are available in two styles, stable halters that feature an adjustable nylon crown, and breakaway halters which feature modern and innovative Flex-Webb crowns. These crowns are designed to provide the safety breakaway benefits of a traditional leather crown, without needing special care, regular cleaning, or eventually deteriorating over time like leather will. These gorgeous halters are available in five colors inspired by the natural landscape of the American desert: Midnight Black, Cactus Green, Coral, Red Sand, and Turquoise. Derby Originals line of Desert Rose halters are also available in four sizes: Miniature Horse, Cob/Arab, Full Horse, and Oversize/Warmblood, which means our halters will fit almost any equine. Please be aware when reading past reviews (before October 2020) that we experienced a small quality issue with our lead ropes where they wore quickly. This was quickly corrected and fixed and this issue has been totally eradicated. We are providing full warranty coverage for any issues previous buyers experienced. We stand behind our products and want our customers to have full confidence in purchasing from us.

  • EXCLUSIVE ROSE GOLD HARDWARE - Derby Originals’ premium halter series features stunning engraved rose gold plated nickel hardware that is attractive, modern, and designed to last. These unique halters are sure to stand out at barns, shows, and events.
  • INNOVATIVE FLEX-WEBB CROWN DESIGN - these unique crowns provide the same safety benefits of a leather crown but don't need special care and will not deteriorate over time. This halter is perfect for owners looking for a better breakaway alternative!
  • NEW REFLECTIVE DESIGN INCREASES SAFETY - our halters are the first on the market to feature 360° rolled reflective trim to increase visibility from all angles and help protect your horse when around cars, during hunting season, or at crowded events.
  • MATCHING SET INCLUDES A HALTER AND LEAD ROPE - each one of our unique halters includes a matching lead rope made of thick, plush, ultra-soft braided poly rope. Sizes Cob, Full Horse, and Oversize include a 10' lead and Mini Horse includes a 7' lead.
  • INCLUDES A ONE YEAR WARRANTY - Derby Originals' premium halter and lead sets come with a one year warranty that protects against quality or manufacturing defects. Visit derbyoriginals.com to learn more and register your product warranty now.

entry.title: Derby Originals Premium Soft Braided Poly Lead Rope - Available in Multiple Colors and Sizes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Lead Ropes
Price: 12.99 - 14.99 (8 variants)

  • PREMIUM STRENGTH NICKEL HARDWARE - this lead rope features a sturdy nickel snap that is designed to be easy to open and close with a smooth trigger action, and hold up to wear and tear for many years to come.
  • PLUSH BRAIDED POLY CONSTRUCTION - our premium lead rope is made from an ultra soft and plush braided poly rope that is designed to be comfortable to hold and prevent irritation or rope burns.
  • AVAILABLE IN FIVE COLORS - our lead ropes are available in five colors inspired by the landscape of the American desert: Midnight Black, Cactus Green, Coral, Red Sand, and Turquoise.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO LENGTHS - our lead ropes are available in two lengths: 7’ (recommended for miniature horses, smaller livestock, or applications where a shorter lead is needed)  or 10’ (the standard lead rope sizing suitable for most applications). Approx. 1" wide.

Derby Originals Premium Braided Poly Lead Ropes are a high quality and attractive alternative to standard, boring leads. Our lead ropes are made with a unique ultra-plush braided poly construction that is much more comfortable to hold than typical stiff and scratchy stiff poly leads. Our lead ropes are designed to not fray or pull apart like other brand’s inferior leads. These attractive leads are available in five colors inspired by the landscape of the American desert: Midnight Black, Cactus Green, Coral, Red Sand, and Turquoise, and in two lengths: 7’ and 10’.
entry.s:tag: matching lead rope for derby halter

entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Lead Ropes
Price: 8.99

Patriotic lead rope in red, white, and blue will make you stand out in the ring for sure. Made of 5/8" quality cotton, 10 ft long, with a durable swivel hook.

 

  • STURDY CONSTRUCTION – these lead ropes are made with high-quality braided cotton and brass plated, rust proof, sturdy metal snaps to guarantee your lead rope lasts for years to come.
  • PATRIOTIC DESIGN – you can show your American pride in style with these flashy and attractive red, white, and blue braided cotton leads.

  • PERFECT FOR TRAINING – whether you’re leading your horse or other animal (dog, goat, sheep, cow, etc.) around, or doing groundwork or training, these ropes are great due to their sturdy and safe construction.

entry.title: Weaver Adjustable Nylon Halter with Throat Snap

Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters

The same original quality-made nylon halter you know and love. Crafted for the ultimate in comfort, performance, and beauty, this 1" halter features heat-sealed oblong buckle holes, box-stitching at stress points and a rolled throat. Brass plated hardware (except looped-on throat snap is solid brass). Be sure to check out the matching lead rope or change it up and mix and match the halter and lead rope colors. (Lead rope sold separately)

entry.title: Paris Tack American Elite Series Fancy Stitch Padded Adjustable Halter - USA Leather
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Leather Halters
Price: 39.99

Paris Tack’s American Elite collection is composed of only the finest USA Leather halters, with soft, supple, vegetable-tanned leather made by Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania. These halters are designed to provide the utmost comfort to your horse in the stable or at pasture, while retaining a high-class look and feel that will remain for many years. These halters are ideal for the discerning rider who wants more for their horse than the basic leather halter, and instead desires something elite.

 

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Paris Tack has been making high-quality leather halters of all types and sizes for 20 years. Our halters come in a variety of styles and leather colors, types, sizes, and with differing features so that you can best find what suits you and your horse!

 

 

 

 

FANCY STITCHING - this halter features eloquent fancy stitching designs on the leather body of the halter, which gives a high-class feel and attractive look to the halter without detracting from your horse’s natural beauty.

USA LEATHER - these halters are made from only the best-quality leather sourced from Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania. These halters were hand-crafted with care and have a beauty and suppleness that cannot be matched.

SOLID LEATHER BUILD - this leather halter features a solid double-layered leather build, which was designed to provide maximum comfort and fit while maintaining a sleek and classic appearance.

BRASS HARDWARE - this leather halter features high-quality rust-proof solid brass hardware, which will look attractive and hold up strong for many years to come.

entry.title: Paris Tack 5 Way Adjustable English Show Halters - USA Leather
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Leather Halters
Price: 39.99

This clever halter is adjustable in 5 different ways... 2 buckles on the crown, 2 buckles on the noseband, and 1 buckle connecting to the nose piece under the chin. Rust-proof solid brass hardware for added style and durability.

  • Double layered leather by Wickett & Craig of America
  • 1" wide leather (weanling and yearling sizes are 3/4" wide)
  • Adjustable in 5 different ways
  • 2 buckles on the crown; 2 buckles on the noseband; 1 buckle connecting to the nose piece under the chin
  • Rust-proof solid brass hardware

entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Leather Halters
Price: 34.99

Derby Originals’ English Opulence collection is composed of classic, traditional English leather halter styles of many types: featuring premium additions such as extra padding on pressure points, double, triple, or fancy stitching, supple and adjustable leather bodies, and more. These halters were designed to be functional and attractive in the barn or at pasture, all while retaining a high-class look and providing a comfortable fit for your horse. If opulence is what you desire then look no further than these high-class, traditionally-designed halters.

 

Features

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Derby Originals has been making high-quality leather halters of all kinds for 20 years. Our halters come in a variety of styles and leather colors, types, sizes, and with different features so that you can best find what suits you and your horse!

SOLID LEATHER BUILD - this leather halter features a solid double-layered leather build, which was designed to provide maximum comfort and fit while maintaining a sleek and classic appearance.

TRIPLE STITCHING - this halter features durable triple stitching designs on the leather body of the halter, which gives a high-class feel and attractive look to the halter while providing strength.

TRADITIONAL DESIGN - this halter features traditional English design with a rolled leather throatlatch, breakaway style crown, and solid leather body.

BRASS HARDWARE - this leather halter features high-quality rust-proof solid brass hardware, which will look attractive and hold up strong for many years to come.

 

Sizing

Cob/Arab (750-1000 lbs)

  • Crown: 19.5” - 22.5”
  • Cheekpieces: 7”
  • Noseband: 13”

Full Horse (900-1250 lbs)

  • Crown: 24” - 27”
  • Cheekpieces: 8”
  • Noseband: 13.5”

entry.title: Paris Tack Double Layered Leather Grow With Me Adjustable Horse Foal Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Leather Halters
Price: 19.99

Paris Tack’s Double Layered Leather Grow With Me Adjustable Horse Foal Halter features a figure-8 design and two sizes of crown pieces that allow for you to adjust the opening sizes for the nose and neck, making sure your halter fits perfectly as your foal grows. Our halters are safe and designed to be comfortable for foals to wear thanks to their soft leather construction that won’t rub or irritate.


  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR FOAL’S COMFORT IN MIND - this halter features a soft leather construction that is comfortable and safe for long term wear. Paris Tack's grow with me halter is designed to never rub, pinch, or irritate your foal.
  • SAFETY EASY-CATCH AND BREAKAWAY DESIGN - these halters have a leather crown that is designed to break and free your foal in the event their halter becomes caught or tangled. This safety design allows this halter to be used in the pasture or stall.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT GROWING FOALS - these halters have an adjustable figure-8 design that allows you to adjust the fit of this halter. This halter includes two crownpieces that can be changed out as your foal grows for a long-lasting fit.
  • INCLUDES TWO CROWN PIECES - Paris Tack's grow with me halter comes with two sizes of crownpiece so that you can adjust the halter to fit most foals from newborn to weanling size.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO LEATHER COLORS - our foal halters are available in two attractive leather colors: Black and Havana

These halters are designed to provide the utmost comfort to your horse in the stable or at pasture, while retaining a high-class look and feel that will remain for many years. These halters are ideal for the discerning rider who wants more for their horse than the basic leather halter, and instead desires something elite.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Paris Tack has been making high-quality leather halters of all types and sizes for 20 years. Our halters come in a variety of styles and leather colors, types, sizes, and with differing features so that you can best find what suits you and your horse!

SOLID LEATHER BUILD - this leather halter features a solid double-layered leather build, which was designed to provide maximum comfort and fit while maintaining a sleek and classic appearance.

TRIPLE STITCHING - this halter features durable triple stitching designs on the leather body of the halter, which gives a high-class feel and attractive look to the halter while providing strength.

USA LEATHER - these halters are made from only the best-quality leather sourced from Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania. These halters were hand-crafted with care and have a beauty and suppleness that cannot be matched.

BRASS HARDWARE - this leather halter features high-quality rust-proof solid brass hardware, which will look attractive and hold up strong for many years to come.

entry.title: Weaver Leather Nylon Llama Halter Full
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 15.09

This 3/4" nylon criss-cross halter features nickel plated hardware that's in-line with today's trends. This halter offers a secure fit. Durable nickel plated hardware. Medium/Large size.

  • Size: Small (Up to 8 months)
  • 3/4" Nylon
  • Nickel Plated Hardware
